dt2.1:1.1: Rūpakkhandho katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahito?
dt2.1:1.2: Rūpakkhandho ekena khandhena ekādasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi saṅgahito.
dt2.1:1.4: Catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi asaṅgahito.
dt2.1:2.1: Vedanākkhandho katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahito?
dt2.1:2.2: Vedanākkhandho ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahito.
dt2.1:2.4: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahito.
dt2.1:3.1: Saññākkhandho katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahito?
dt2.1:3.2: Saññākkhandho ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahito.
dt2.1:3.4: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahito.
dt2.1:4.1: Saṅkhārakkhandho katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahito?
dt2.1:4.2: Saṅkhārakkhandho ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahito.
dt2.1:4.4: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahito.
dt2.1:5.1: Viññāṇakkhandho katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahito?
dt2.1:5.2: Viññāṇakkhandho ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi saṅgahito.
dt2.1:5.4: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahito.
dt2.1:7.1: Rūpakkhandho ca vedanākkhandho ca katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahitā?
dt2.1:7.2: Rūpakkhandho ca vedanākkhandho ca dvīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:7.4: Tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:8.2: dvīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:8.4: Tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:9.2: dvīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:9.4: Tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:10.2: dvīhi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:10.4: Tīhi khandhehi, na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:12.1: Rūpakkhandho ca vedanākkhandho ca saññākkhandho ca katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahitā?
dt2.1:12.2: Rūpakkhandho ca vedanākkhandho ca saññākkhandho ca tīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:12.4: Dvīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:13.1: Rūpakkhandho ca vedanākkhandho ca saṅkhārakkhandho ca …pe…
dt2.1:13.2: tīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:13.4: Dvīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:14.1: Rūpakkhandho ca vedanākkhandho ca viññāṇakkhandho ca …pe…
dt2.1:14.2: tīhi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:14.4: Dvīhi khandhehi, na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:16.1: Rūpakkhandho ca vedanākkhandho ca saññākkhandho ca saṅkhārakkhandho ca katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahitā?
dt2.1:16.2: Rūpakkhandho ca vedanākkhandho ca saññākkhandho ca saṅkhārakkhandho ca catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:16.4: Ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:17.1: Rūpakkhandho ca vedanākkhandho ca saññākkhandho ca viññāṇakkhandho ca …pe…
dt2.1:17.2: catūhi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:17.4: Ekena khandhena, na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:19.1: Rūpakkhandho ca vedanākkhandho ca saññākkhandho ca saṅkhārakkhandho ca viññāṇakkhandho ca katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahitā?
dt2.1:19.2: Rūpakkhandho ca vedanākkhandho ca saññākkhandho ca saṅkhārakkhandho ca viññāṇakkhandho ca pañcahi khandhehi dvādasāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:19.4: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:20.1: Pañcakkhandhā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahitā?
dt2.1:20.2: Pañcakkhandhā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:20.4: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:22.1: Cakkhāyatanaṁ katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahitaṁ?
dt2.1:22.2: Cakkhāyatanaṁ ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitaṁ.
dt2.1:22.4: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitaṁ.
dt2.1:23.1: Sotāyatanaṁ … ghānāyatanaṁ … jivhāyatanaṁ … kāyāyatanaṁ … rūpāyatanaṁ … saddāyatanaṁ … gandhāyatanaṁ … rasāyatanaṁ …
dt2.1:23.3: ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitaṁ.
dt2.1:23.5: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitaṁ.
dt2.1:24.1: Manāyatanaṁ ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi saṅgahitaṁ.
dt2.1:24.3: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitaṁ.
dt2.1:25.1: Dhammāyatanaṁ asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitaṁ.
dt2.1:25.3: Ekena khandhena ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitaṁ.
dt2.1:27.1: Cakkhāyatanañca sotāyatanañca ekena khandhena dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:27.3: Catūhi khandhehi dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:28.1: Cakkhāyatanañca ghānāyatanañca … cakkhāyatanañca jivhāyatanañca … cakkhāyatanañca kāyāyatanañca … cakkhāyatanañca rūpāyatanañca … cakkhāyatanañca saddāyatanañca … cakkhāyatanañca gandhāyatanañca … cakkhāyatanañca rasāyatanañca … cakkhāyatanañca phoṭṭhabbāyatanañca ekena khandhena dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:28.3: Catūhi khandhehi dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:29.1: Cakkhāyatanañca manāyatanañca dvīhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:29.3: Tīhi khandhehi dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:30.1: Cakkhāyatanañca dhammāyatanañca asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:30.3: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:32.1: Dvādasāyatanāni katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahitā?
dt2.1:32.2: Dvādasāyatanāni asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:32.4: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:34.1: Cakkhudhātu katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahitā?
dt2.1:34.2: Cakkhudhātu ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:34.4: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:35.1: Sotadhātu … ghānadhātu … jivhādhātu … kāyadhātu … rūpadhātu … saddadhātu … gandhadhātu … rasadhātu … phoṭṭhabbadhātu … cakkhuviññāṇadhātu … sotaviññāṇadhātu … ghānaviññāṇadhātu … jivhāviññāṇadhātu … kāyaviññāṇadhātu … manodhātu … manoviññāṇadhātu ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:35.3: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:36.1: Dhammadhātu asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:36.3: Ekena khandhena ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:38.1: Cakkhudhātu ca sotadhātu ca ekena khandhena dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:38.3: Catūhi khandhehi dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:39.1: Cakkhudhātu ca ghānadhātu ca … cakkhudhātu ca jivhādhātu ca … cakkhudhātu ca kāyadhātu ca … cakkhudhātu ca rūpadhātu ca … cakkhudhātu ca saddadhātu ca … cakkhudhātu ca gandhadhātu ca … cakkhudhātu ca rasadhātu ca … cakkhudhātu ca phoṭṭhabbadhātu ca ekena khandhena dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:39.3: Catūhi khandhehi dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:40.1: Cakkhudhātu ca cakkhuviññāṇadhātu ca dvīhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:40.3: Tīhi khandhehi dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:41.1: Cakkhudhātu ca sotaviññāṇadhātu ca … cakkhudhātu ca ghānaviññāṇadhātu ca … cakkhudhātu ca jivhāviññāṇadhātu ca … cakkhudhātu ca kāyaviññāṇadhātu ca … cakkhudhātu ca manodhātu ca … cakkhudhātu ca manoviññāṇadhātu ca dvīhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:41.3: Tīhi khandhehi dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:42.1: Cakkhudhātu ca dhammadhātu ca asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:42.3: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:44.1: Aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahitā?
dt2.1:44.2: Aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:44.4: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:46.1: Dukkhasaccaṁ katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahitaṁ?
dt2.1:46.2: Dukkhasaccaṁ pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitaṁ.
dt2.1:46.4: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitaṁ.
dt2.1:47.1: Samudayasaccaṁ … maggasaccaṁ ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitaṁ.
dt2.1:47.3: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitaṁ.
dt2.1:48.1: Nirodhasaccaṁ na kehici khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitaṁ.
dt2.1:48.3: Pañcahi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitaṁ.
dt2.1:50.1: Dukkhasaccañca samudayasaccañca pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:50.3: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:51.1: Dukkhasaccañca maggasaccañca pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:51.3: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.1:52.3: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:54.1: Dukkhasaccañca samudayasaccañca maggasaccañca pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:54.3: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:55.1: Dukkhasaccañca samudayasaccañca nirodhasaccañca asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:55.3: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:57.1: Dukkhasaccañca samudayasaccañca maggasaccañca nirodhasaccañca asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:57.3: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:58.1: Cattāri saccāni katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahitāni?
dt2.1:58.2: Cattāri saccāni asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitāni.
dt2.1:58.4: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitāni.
dt2.1:60.1: Cakkhundriyaṁ katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahitaṁ?
dt2.1:60.2: Cakkhundriyaṁ ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitaṁ.
dt2.1:60.4: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitaṁ.
dt2.1:61.1: Sotindriyaṁ … ghānindriyaṁ … jivhindriyaṁ … kāyindriyaṁ … itthindriyaṁ … purisindriyaṁ ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitaṁ.
dt2.1:61.3: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitaṁ.
dt2.1:62.1: Manindriyaṁ ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi saṅgahitaṁ.
dt2.1:62.3: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitaṁ.
dt2.1:63.1: Jīvitindriyaṁ dvīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitaṁ.
dt2.1:63.3: Tīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitaṁ.
dt2.1:64.1: Sukhindriyaṁ … dukkhindriyaṁ … somanassindriyaṁ … domanassindriyaṁ … upekkhindriyaṁ … saddhindriyaṁ … vīriyindriyaṁ … satindriyaṁ … samādhindriyaṁ … paññindriyaṁ … anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ … aññindriyaṁ … aññātāvindriyaṁ ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitaṁ.
dt2.1:64.3: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitaṁ.
dt2.1:66.1: Cakkhundriyañca sotindriyañca ekena khandhena dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:66.3: Catūhi khandhehi dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:67.1: Cakkhundriyañca ghānindriyañca … cakkhundriyañca jivhindriyañca … cakkhundriyañca kāyindriyañca … cakkhundriyañca itthindriyañca … cakkhundriyañca purisindriyañca ekena khandhena dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:67.3: Catūhi khandhehi dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:68.1: Cakkhundriyañca manindriyañca dvīhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:68.3: Tīhi khandhehi dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:69.1: Cakkhundriyañca jīvitindriyañca dvīhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:69.3: Tīhi khandhehi dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:70.1: Cakkhundriyañca sukhindriyañca … cakkhundriyañca dukkhindriyañca … cakkhundriyañca somanassindriyañca … cakkhundriyañca domanassindriyañca … cakkhundriyañca upekkhindriyañca … cakkhundriyañca saddhindriyañca … cakkhundriyañca vīriyindriyañca … cakkhundriyañca satindriyañca … cakkhundriyañca samādhindriyañca … cakkhundriyañca paññindriyañca … cakkhundriyañca anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca … cakkhundriyañca aññindriyañca … cakkhundriyañca aññātāvindriyañca dvīhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:70.3: Tīhi khandhehi dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:72.1: Bāvīsatindriyāni katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahitāni?
dt2.1:72.2: Bāvīsatindriyāni catūhi khandhehi sattahāyatanehi terasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitāni.
dt2.1:72.4: Ekena khandhena pañcahāyatanehi pañcahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitāni.
dt2.1:73.1: Avijjā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:73.3: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:74.1: Avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:74.3: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:75.1: Saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṁ ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi saṅgahitaṁ.
dt2.1:75.3: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitaṁ.
dt2.1:76.1: Viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpaṁ catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitaṁ.
dt2.1:76.3: Ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitaṁ.
dt2.1:77.1: Nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatanaṁ dvīhi khandhehi chahāyatanehi dvādasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitaṁ.
dt2.1:77.3: Tīhi khandhehi chahāyatanehi chahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitaṁ.
dt2.1:78.1: Saḷāyatanapaccayā phasso … phassapaccayā vedanā … vedanāpaccayā taṇhā … taṇhāpaccayā upādānaṁ … kammabhavo ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahito.
dt2.1:78.3: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahito.
dt2.1:79.1: Upapattibhavo … kāmabhavo … saññābhavo … pañcavokārabhavo pañcahi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi saṅgahito.
dt2.1:79.3: Na kehici khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā asaṅgahito.
dt2.1:80.1: Rūpabhavo pañcahi khandhehi pañcahāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi saṅgahito.
dt2.1:80.3: Na kehici khandhehi sattahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahito.
dt2.1:81.1: Arūpabhavo … nevasaññānāsaññābhavo … catuvokārabhavo catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahito.
dt2.1:81.3: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahito.
dt2.1:82.1: Asaññābhavo … ekavokārabhavo ekena khandhena dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahito.
dt2.1:82.3: Catūhi khandhehi dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahito.
dt2.1:83.1: Jāti dvīhi khandhehi … jarā dvīhi khandhehi … maraṇaṁ dvīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitaṁ.
dt2.1:83.3: Tīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitaṁ.
dt2.1:84.1: Soko … paridevo … dukkhaṁ … domanassaṁ … upāyāso … satipaṭṭhānaṁ … sammappadhānaṁ ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitaṁ.
dt2.1:84.3: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitaṁ.
dt2.1:85.1: Iddhipādo dvīhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahito.
dt2.1:85.3: Tīhi khandhehi dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahito.
dt2.1:86.1: Jhānaṁ dvīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitaṁ.
dt2.1:86.3: Tīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitaṁ.
dt2.1:87.1: Appamaññā … pañcindriyāni … pañca balāni … satta bojjhaṅgā … ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo … phasso … vedanā … saññā … cetanā … adhimokkho … manasikāro ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahito.
dt2.1:87.3: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahito.
dt2.1:88.1: Cittaṁ ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi saṅgahitaṁ.
dt2.1:88.3: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitaṁ.
dt2.1:89.1: Kusalā dhammā … akusalā dhammā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahitā?
dt2.1:89.2: Kusalā dhammā … akusalā dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:89.4: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:90.1: Abyākatā dhammā asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:90.3: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:91.1: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā dhammā … dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttā dhammā tīhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi tīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:91.3: Dvīhi khandhehi dasahāyatanehi pannarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:92.1: Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā dhammā tīhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi sattahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:92.3: Dvīhi khandhehi dasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:93.1: Vipākā dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:93.3: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:94.1: Vipākadhammadhammā … saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikā dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:94.3: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:95.1: Nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammā asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi terasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:95.3: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi pañcahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:96.1: Upādinnupādāniyā dhammā pañcahi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:96.3: Na kehici khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:97.1: Anupādinnupādāniyā dhammā pañcahi khandhehi sattahāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:97.3: Na kehici khandhehi pañcahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:98.1: Anupādinnaanupādāniyā dhammā … asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikā dhammā asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:98.3: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:99.1: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikā dhammā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:99.3: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:100.1: Savitakkasavicārā dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi tīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:100.3: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi pannarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:101.1: Avitakkavicāramattā dhammā … pītisahagatā dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:101.3: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:102.1: Avitakkaavicārā dhammā asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:102.3: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi ekāya dhātuyā asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:103.1: Sukhasahagatā dhammā tīhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi tīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:103.3: Dvīhi khandhehi dasahāyatanehi pannarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:104.1: Upekkhāsahagatā dhammā tīhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi sattahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:104.3: Dvīhi khandhehi dasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:105.1: Dassanena pahātabbā dhammā … bhāvanāya pahātabbā dhammā … dassanena pahātabbahetukā dhammā … bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukā dhammā … ācayagāmino dhammā … apacayagāmino dhammā … sekkhā dhammā … asekkhā dhammā … mahaggatā dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:105.3: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:106.1: Neva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbā dhammā … neva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukā dhammā … nevācayagāmināpacayagāmino dhammā … nevasekkhanāsekkhā dhammā asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:106.3: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:107.1: Parittā dhammā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:107.3: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:108.1: Appamāṇā dhammā … paṇītā dhammā asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:108.3: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:109.1: Parittārammaṇā dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:109.3: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:110.1: Mahaggatārammaṇā dhammā … appamāṇārammaṇā dhammā … hīnā dhammā … micchattaniyatā dhammā … sammattaniyatā dhammā … maggārammaṇā dhammā … maggahetukā dhammā … maggādhipatino dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:110.3: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:111.1: Majjhimā dhammā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:111.3: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:112.1: Aniyatā dhammā asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:112.3: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:113.1: Uppannā dhammā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:113.3: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:114.1: Anuppannā dhammā pañcahi khandhehi sattahāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:114.3: Na kehici khandhehi pañcahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:115.1: Uppādino dhammā pañcahi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:115.3: Na kehici khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:116.1: Atītā dhammā … anāgatā dhammā … paccuppannā dhammā … ajjhattā dhammā … ajjhattabahiddhā dhammā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:116.3: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:117.1: Bahiddhā dhammā asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:117.3: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:118.1: Atītārammaṇā dhammā … anāgatārammaṇā dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:118.3: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:119.1: Paccuppannārammaṇā dhammā … ajjhattārammaṇā dhammā … bahiddhārammaṇā dhammā … ajjhattabahiddhārammaṇā dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:119.3: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:120.1: Sanidassanasappaṭighā dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:120.3: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:121.1: Anidassanasappaṭighā dhammā ekena khandhena navahāyatanehi navahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:121.3: Catūhi khandhehi tīhāyatanehi navahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:122.1: Anidassanaappaṭighā dhammā asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā pañcahi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:122.3: Na kehici khandhehi, dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:123.1: Hetū dhammā … hetū ceva sahetukā ca dhammā … hetū ceva hetusampayuttā ca dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:123.3: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:124.1: Na hetū dhammā … ahetukā dhammā … hetuvippayuttā dhammā … na hetu ahetukā dhammā asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:124.3: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:125.1: Sahetukā dhammā … hetusampayuttā dhammā … sahetukā ceva na ca hetu dhammā … hetusampayuttā ceva na ca hetū dhammā … na hetū sahetukā dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:125.3: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:126.1: Sappaccayā dhammā … saṅkhatā dhammā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:126.3: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:127.1: Appaccayā dhammā … asaṅkhatā dhammā na kehici khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:127.3: Pañcahi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:128.1: Sanidassanā dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:128.3: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:129.1: Anidassanā dhammā asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā pañcahi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:129.3: Na kehici khandhehi, ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:130.1: Sappaṭighā dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:130.3: Catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:131.1: Appaṭighā dhammā asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā pañcahi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:131.3: Na kehici khandhehi, dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:132.1: Rūpino dhammā ekena khandhena ekādasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:132.3: Catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:133.1: Arūpino dhammā asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:133.3: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:134.1: Lokiyā dhammā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:134.3: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:135.1: Lokuttarā dhammā asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:135.3: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:136.1: Kenaci viññeyyā dhammā … kenaci na viññeyyā dhammā asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:136.3: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:137.1: Āsavā dhammā … āsavā ceva sāsavā ca dhammā … āsavā ceva āsavasampayuttā ca dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:137.3: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:138.1: No āsavā dhammā … āsavavippayuttā dhammā asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:138.3: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:139.1: Sāsavā dhammā … sāsavā ceva no ca āsavā dhammā … āsavavippayuttā sāsavā dhammā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:139.3: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:140.1: Anāsavā dhammā … āsavavippayuttā anāsavā dhammā asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:140.3: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:141.1: Āsavasampayuttā dhammā … āsavasampayuttā ceva no ca āsavā dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:141.3: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:142.1: Saṁyojanā dhammā … ganthā dhammā … oghā dhammā … yogā dhammā … nīvaraṇā dhammā … parāmāsā dhammā … parāmāsā ceva parāmaṭṭhā ca dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:142.3: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:143.1: No parāmāsā dhammā … parāmāsavippayuttā dhammā asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:143.3: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:144.1: Parāmaṭṭhā dhammā … parāmaṭṭhā ceva no ca parāmāsā dhammā … parāmāsavippayuttā parāmaṭṭhā dhammā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:144.3: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:145.1: Aparāmaṭṭhā dhammā … parāmāsavippayuttā aparāmaṭṭhā dhammā asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:145.3: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:146.1: Parāmāsasampayuttā dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:146.3: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:147.1: Sārammaṇā dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:147.3: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:148.1: Anārammaṇā dhammā asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā ekena khandhena ekādasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:148.3: Catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:149.1: Cittā dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:149.3: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:150.1: No cittā dhammā asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:150.3: Ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:151.1: Cetasikā dhammā … cittasampayuttā dhammā … cittasaṁsaṭṭhā dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:151.3: Dvīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:152.1: Acetasikā dhammā asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā dvīhi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:152.3: Tīhi khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:153.1: Cittavippayuttā dhammā … cittavisaṁsaṭṭhā dhammā asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā ekena khandhena ekādasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:153.3: Catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:154.1: Cittasamuṭṭhānā dhammā catūhi khandhehi chahāyatanehi chahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:154.3: Ekena khandhena chahāyatanehi dvādasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:155.1: No cittasamuṭṭhānā dhammā … no cittasahabhuno dhammā … no cittānuparivattino dhammā asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā dvīhi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:155.3: Tīhi khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:156.1: Cittasahabhuno dhammā … cittānuparivattino dhammā catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:156.3: Ekena khandhena ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:157.1: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānā dhammā … cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuno dhammā … cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattino dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:157.3: Dvīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:158.1: No cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānā dhammā … no cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuno dhammā … no cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattino dhammā asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā dvīhi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:158.3: Tīhi khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:159.1: Ajjhattikā dhammā dvīhi khandhehi chahāyatanehi dvādasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:159.3: Tīhi khandhehi chahāyatanehi chahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:160.1: Bāhirā dhammā asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā catūhi khandhehi chahāyatanehi chahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:160.3: Ekena khandhena chahāyatanehi dvādasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:161.1: Upādā dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:161.3: Catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:162.1: No upādā dhammā asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā pañcahi khandhehi tīhāyatanehi navahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:162.3: Na kehici khandhehi navahāyatanehi navahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:163.1: Upādinnā dhammā pañcahi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:163.3: Na kehici khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:164.1: Anupādinnā dhammā asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā pañcahi khandhehi sattahāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:164.3: Na kehici khandhehi pañcahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:165.1: Upādānā dhammā … kilesā dhammā … kilesā ceva saṅkilesikā ca dhammā … kilesā ceva saṅkiliṭṭhā ca dhammā … kilesā ceva kilesasampayuttā ca dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:165.3: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:166.1: No kilesā dhammā … asaṅkiliṭṭhā dhammā … kilesavippayuttā dhammā asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:166.3: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:167.1: Saṅkilesikā dhammā … saṅkilesikā ceva no ca kilesā dhammā … kilesavippayuttā saṅkilesikā dhammā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:167.3: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:168.1: Asaṅkilesikā dhammā … kilesavippayuttā asaṅkilesikā dhammā asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:168.3: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:169.1: Saṅkiliṭṭhā dhammā … kilesasampayuttā dhammā … saṅkiliṭṭhā ceva no ca kilesā dhammā … kilesasampayuttā ceva no ca kilesā dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:169.3: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:170.1: Dassanena pahātabbā dhammā … bhāvanāya pahātabbā dhammā … dassanena pahātabbahetukā dhammā … bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukā dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:170.3: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:171.1: Na dassanena pahātabbā dhammā … na bhāvanāya pahātabbā dhammā … na dassanena pahātabbahetukā dhammā … na bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukā dhammā asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:171.3: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:172.1: Savitakkā dhammā … savicārā dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi tīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:172.3: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi pannarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:173.1: Avitakkā dhammā … avicārā dhammā asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:173.3: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi ekāya dhātuyā asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:174.1: Sappītikā dhammā … pītisahagatā dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:174.3: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:175.1: Appītikā dhammā … na pītisahagatā dhammā … na sukhasahagatā dhammā asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:175.3: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:176.1: Sukhasahagatā dhammā tīhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi tīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:176.3: Dvīhi khandhehi dasahāyatanehi pannarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:177.1: Upekkhāsahagatā dhammā tīhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi sattahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:177.3: Dvīhi khandhehi dasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:178.1: Na upekkhāsahagatā dhammā asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi terasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:178.3: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi pañcahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:179.1: Kāmāvacarā dhammā … pariyāpannā dhammā … sauttarā dhammā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:179.3: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:180.1: Na kāmāvacarā dhammā … apariyāpannā dhammā … anuttarā dhammā asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:180.3: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:181.1: Rūpāvacarā dhammā … arūpāvacarā dhammā … niyyānikā dhammā … niyatā dhammā … saraṇā dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:181.3: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.1:182.1: Na rūpāvacarā dhammā … na arūpāvacarā dhammā … aniyyānikā dhammā … aniyatā dhammā … araṇā dhammā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahitā?
dt2.1:182.2: Araṇā dhammā asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.1:182.4: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
